column4: I have disabled the floppy drive (even though i dont have one) from the boot priority list in BIOS and im still getting the "Buffer I/O error on device fd0, logical block 0" Error.
look through the BIOS setup again and see if you can disable it from the device list as well
there is normally an option for disabling the floppy controller under Integrated Peripherals or similar
if it's not there, I don't know what to suggest -- definitely a weird problem
